{"step_by_step_thinking": "The study compares the survival time of patients diagnosed with GBM through screening MRI versus those who developed symptoms first. The average survival time for asymptomatic patients is 6 weeks longer than that of symptomatic patients. This suggests that earlier detection through screening MRI may be associated with improved survival.
